imgAltText: An image of a fresh greek salad.
description: Our famous greek salad, a fresh mix of lettuce, peppers, olives and feta cheese, tossed in a zesty dressing, and topped with crunchy croutons.
Start your meal off with our best appetizer, toasted bread fresh daily from a local bakery, with a cubed tomato topping drizzled with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Light and moist lemon cake layered with lemon curd makes this a favorite and refreshing dessert choice.
